FuncDef:
The active pcp vsuf command enables the PCP function on a specified service board.
The undo active pcp vsuf command disables the PCP function on a specified service board.
By default, the PCP function is disabled on a service board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a service board.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The license for PCP must be enabled on a VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S and the active pcp vsuf command must be run before PCP functions are configured.
Precautions
If a service board is Down or fails to be detected, the service board does not automatically release PCP license resources. To release the license resources, run the undo active pcp vsuf command.
